text:
What's up everyone! oday we're learning english 
with the hit tv series Breaking Bad. In case

you're new here we help you to learn fast English 
without getting lost, without missing the jokes

and without subtitles. Just like Ro who 
says that our channel is beyond amazing.
So don't forget to hit that subscribe button and

the bell down below so that you don't 
miss a single one of our new lessons!

Do you find it difficult to 
understand fast speaking natives?

Then I highly recommend our Fluent with Friends 
Course. In this 48 week Course you will learn

with the first two seasons of Friends. 
You'll receive PDF Power Lessons every week,

vocabulary memorization software, access to 
our Fluency Circle Global Community and so much

more! And did you know you can try it right now 
absolutely free with our three-part Masterclass!

All you have to do is click up here or down in 
the description box below to learn more and sign

up now! We look forward to seeing you there.
If you want to learn how natives really speak

just like Jessie in Breaking Bad 
then I highly recommend this lesson

that Ethan made about school English versus 
Real Life English over on our Real Life English

Channel so you can click up here or down in the 
description box below to watch that lesson next!
